msbt.message: Alright, what's with everyone being all blurry and stuff today? This is getting pretty weird, .
'Sup! I don't keep it fancy around here, but you're welcome to chill as long as you like, .
Welcome! Feel free to make yourself at home or whatever, .Hey, you alright? You're looking kinda tired. If you wanna take a nap or something, I won't stop you.
I heard you can't feel pain in a dream, but I tripped over a chair a few minutes ago, and Ow!
I guess you could call this my dream house. Like, it's literally my house in a dream, . So strange!

If you wanna fall asleep when you're awake, you count sheep. But what do you count to fall, uhdouble asleep? Actually, if you're anything like me, doing any kind of math at all will knock you right out, .
